room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game New Orleans in New Orleans
room_address: 233 North Peters Street, New Orleans, LA 70130
room_description: Your world-class espionage outfit has landed you inside a prestigious art museum. A recently stolen masterpiece is presumed hidden within the office of the museum’s egotistical curator, Vincent Hahn. With the help of your intelligence agent on the outside, you have one hour to find your way into Hahn’s office, recover the painting, and slip away before Hahn returns.
